--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Rowdy Wolf:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Rowdy Wolf sneered at KitKat. He narrowed his optics at her. "You 
> can't do anything for me. But you can help them." He turned his 
> yellow optics away from her. "Although, it could be painful." He 
> grinned.
